classes canceled Read full article: ‘Potential threat’ prompts lockdown at Bethune-Cookman University; classes canceled Sign up for our events newsletter: Sign Up Local News Flagler Beach art gallery owner to open café, bar & grill 3-story venue to serve breakfast, lunch and dinner with a view Patricia Tolley , Content Gatherer Published: December 9, 2023 at 10:00 AM Updated: December 9, 2023 at 10:13 AM Tags: Flagler Beach , Flagler County , Florida Foodie , Food Chef MJ Smith (left) and a hashbrown bowl (right) (Copyright 2023 by WKMG ClickOrlando - All rights reserved.) FLAGLER BEACH, Fla. – Marge and Ted Barnhill are in their 70s and rather than relaxing beachside enjoying retirement, they are getting ready to open a restaurant. This new eatery is Barnhill’s Café, Bar & Grill, which opens mid-January and will be located at 202 S. Central Avenue in Flagler Beach, according to front-of-house manager Tara Palazzotto. Recommended Videos Marge and Ted Barnhill are husband and wife, with Marge owning the Gallery of Local Art next door to the new café. However, Marge always had a dream of operating a restaurant and Ted finally agreed to expand their investment in the city, Palazzotto said. [EXCLUSIVE: Become a News 6 Insider (it’s FREE) | PINIT! Share your photos ] Barnhill’s Café, Bar & Grill will be a three-story venue, serving breakfast, lunch and dinner with a view of the beach. It is working on hiring 20-30 employees at this time. MJ Smith is the executive chef creating the vast menu for the eatery. Right now, the test kitchen is underway, with Smith and his team working to nail down the exact dishes that will be served, according to the restaurant’s Facebook page . Meanwhile, one item Smith confirmed will be available at Barnhill’s is its breakfast crispy hash brown bowls, which he thinks will be a huge seller. These bowls will come in a variety of styles with different toppings such as eggs, cheese and bacon. Overall, to monitor when the restaurant posts its official grand opening date and hours of operations click here. Check out the Florida Foodie podcast. You can find every episode in the media player below: Copyright 2023 by WKMG ClickOrlando - All rights reserved.
